briefTitle: Differential Expression and Potential Value of c-MYC in Non-Invasive and Invasive Mammary Carcinoma
officialTitle: Differential Expression and Potential Value of c-MYC in Non-invasive and Invasive Mammary Carcinoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: role of c-MYC in breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Specimens of Modified Radical Mastectomies from breast carcinoma patients

Exclusion Criteria:

* Cases with insufficient clinical data.

  * Tissue blocks of destroyed or insufficient material, unfit for diagnosis.
  * Cases who received pre-operative chemotherapy.
